title: Science Education Design to Bridge E-Learning Capacity Gaps in Developing Countries

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science education concepts and experience with e-learning platforms
context.additional_context: Education utilizing VR simulation tools accessible primarily via smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four elements of the e-learning competency gap framework: design, production, tutorials, and community building.
Learners can design science content using smartphone-based VR simulation tools in resource-constrained technical environments.
Learners can analyze barriers to e-learning adoption in developing country educational contexts and propose strategic responses.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
